name: Lg G Pad V400 8 Gb Tablet - 7" - In-plane Switching [ips] Technology - Wireless Lan - Qualcomm Snapdragon 1.20 Ghz - Black - 1 Gb Ram - Android 4.4.2 Kitkat - Slate - 1280 X 800 (lgv400-ausabk)

reviews.name: Lg G Pad V400 8 Gb Tablet - 7" - In-plane Switching [ips] Technology - Wireless Lan - Qualcomm Snapdragon 1.20 Ghz - Black - 1 Gb Ram - Android 4.4.2 Kitkat - Slate - 1280 X 800 (lgv400-ausabk)
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pad for my wife to use instead of her i phone. she loves it but also all the grandkids love it. looks like i will be buying 4 more for christmas if i can find them. the pad is very fast and does everything we have tried to do with it. great features and easy to use. seems to be very well made.
reviews.title: Great features for the price

reviews.name: Lg G Pad V400 8 Gb Tablet - 7" - In-plane Switching [ips] Technology - Wireless Lan - Qualcomm Snapdragon 1.20 Ghz - Black - 1 Gb Ram - Android 4.4.2 Kitkat - Slate - 1280 X 800 (lgv400-ausabk)
reviews.reviewText: This is my first tablet and am pretty happy with it! Keep finding new features, love the camera voice commands, definitely a plus! One downside it's been to find a protective cover though......
reviews.title: nice tablet

reviews.name: Lg G Pad V400 8 Gb Tablet - 7" - In-plane Switching [ips] Technology - Wireless Lan - Qualcomm Snapdragon 1.20 Ghz - Black - 1 Gb Ram - Android 4.4.2 Kitkat - Slate - 1280 X 800 (lgv400-ausabk)
reviews.reviewText: Nice and small to travel with. Fits in hands really well. Screens very clear and bright. Battery lasts forever. Camera quality is good. Accessories are very compatible.
reviews.title: Overall functionality is great

reviews.name: Lg G Pad V400 8 Gb Tablet - 7" - In-plane Switching [ips] Technology - Wireless Lan - Qualcomm Snapdragon 1.20 Ghz - Black - 1 Gb Ram - Android 4.4.2 Kitkat - Slate - 1280 X 800 (lgv400-ausabk)
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift for my daughter and she loves it! She has had no complaints about it. The tablet has been efficient and fast whenever she is on it. I bought her a Notebook tablet last Christmas and it was dead by the next Christmas so I had to get her this one. To date I have been thoroughly satified with all the LG products I have brought for my home which include this laptop and two televisions.
reviews.title: Great Starter Tablet

reviews.name: Lg G Pad V400 8 Gb Tablet - 7" - In-plane Switching [ips] Technology - Wireless Lan - Qualcomm Snapdragon 1.20 Ghz - Black - 1 Gb Ram - Android 4.4.2 Kitkat - Slate - 1280 X 800 (lgv400-ausabk)
reviews.reviewText: I love it. Its the perfect ALL-IN-ONE device!
reviews.title: I love it!
